name: Angle Race
description: Angle  Race -  turn-based  race game for 2-4 players on android.  You play on car which can drive only in 8 directions: up, down, left, right and diagonally. Your car can`t drive over the road, also it`s some other staff, like bridges, which breaks when on it 2 or more players. The idea is wery simpe, but also exciting
